name: Corrinda Andoh

experience.title: Lead AI Engineer
experience.description: Developed multi-layered AI model for Boeing St. Louis' fleet of commercial aircraft that increased efficiency by 15%, resulting in an estimated cost savings of $2 million annually. Led the integration of artificial intelligence into existing data systems enabling faster and more accurate decision-making processes across all departments; improved customer satisfaction ratings from 68% to 85%. Produced detailed documentation outlining best practices for using AI technology within the company, which was adopted as standard training protocol throughout all divisions; reduced training time by 30%.

experience.title: Senior AI Engineer
experience.description: Developed an AI-based patient monitoring system that improved Cerner Corporation's response time to medical emergencies by 25%, resulting in a 10% reduction in mortality rates. Architected and implemented an automated voice recognition software solution which reduced the average call wait times from 10 minutes to 2 minutes, leading to increased customer satisfaction ratings by 20%. Utilized natural language processing technology for automatic data extraction from various healthcare documents; this resulted in increasing operational efficiency and saving up to 4 hours per week on manual document review tasks.

education.institution: University of Science and Technology, MO
education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Artificial Intelligence Engineering

key_accomplishments: Developed and deployed AI solutions that increased efficiency, reduced costs, and improved customer satisfaction for major organizations.
certifications: AWS Certified Machine Learning Specialty, Feb 2020
summary: Engineer with over 10 years of professional experience developing, implementing and optimizing AI-based solutions. Extensive knowledge in deep learning, natural language processing and machine learning. Experience includes developing, training and deploying AI frameworks such as TensorFlow, Keras and Scikit-Learn; building custom APIs and web applications; proficient in Python, Java and C++. Completed end-to-end projects, including data pre-processing, training, testing and deployment. Work has enabled clients to improve their efficiency, accuracy and cost-effectiveness.
